title: useCallback for Memoized Functions
instructions:
Create a component that demonstrates useCallback to prevent unnecessary re-renders.

Requirements:
1. Create a parent component with a counter
2. Create a child component that receives a callback prop
3. Wrap the child in React.memo to prevent unnecessary re-renders
4. Use useCallback to memoize the callback function
5. Show render counts for both parent and child

useCallback returns a memoized version of the callback that only changes if dependencies change. Combined with React.memo, it prevents child components from re-rendering unnecessarily.
